530480.name: Eternal Destiny - Angel's Ladder:  Next Manhattan Project
530480.description:
NEW Scenario! Angel's Ladder: Next Manhattan Project

Rumors whisper that Cybers have restarted the "Next Manhattan" Project. This could have catastrophic results for the entire planet.
Go with your navigator to verify the rumors and stop the project if true. The fate of Earth is in your hands!

NEW Dungeon! Angels' Domain

Explore the holiest place, scout new allies, and build up your deck!

Bonus 13 Cards!

Get one of each of the 12 non-evolved Angels cards to boost your deck, and a rare 5 Metatron card as a bonus!
530480.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*, 简体中文, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
